Description: Ostracon bearing 5 lines of Greek text containing a bill written by the notary Markos and consigning 50 artabas of barley to a boat captain.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: West Bank Survey of Sudanese Lower Nubia
Bibliographic references: Ruffini 2010 / Nubian ostraka from the West Bank Survey (no.5)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395062) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395062)
Acquisition name: Donated by: West Bank Survey of Sudanese Lower Nubia
